content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) 

### Copper cable factory
Not enough information to determine the structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a fuel source before attempting to use them
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_FUEL state

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before attempting to use them
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NOT_CONNECTED state

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK state

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_INGREDIENTS state

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items before attempting to use them
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS state

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
